ComicInfo.Summary: Doc Seismic escapes form Jail, and captures all of earth's superheroes including Wolf-Man, Savage Dragon, and even the entire Capes corporation have been captured, and taken underground. During this time Invincible is in Africa trying to talk to Atom Eve about their little incident a few days back when Cecil pages Mark. He tells Mark whats happening and Eve, and Invincible go to help out. When they reach the underground layer Atom Eve, and Invincible are bombarded with monsters. Eve is caught off guard and knocked out. Wolf Man tries to help out yet is knocked out as well. Invincible fights off the monsters one after the other when he reaches Doc Seismic he is so exhausted that he falls to the floor. Doc Seismic yells out,"I WIN!"
